entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NET 8.0] Error CS0246: The type or namespace name 'CborWriter' could not be found #77296
  • superpmi-replay pipeline fails when re-run in CI due to the log artifact already existing #77295
    8.0.0
  • arm64 altjit and HW intrinsics #77294
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Assert failed: ERR41: Unknown converter for type 13 #77287
    8.0.0
  • When debugging mixed mode, stepping turns into a "go" #77286
    Future
  • Add <WasmExtraFilesToDeploy> to Up-to-date Check #77285
  • `perf-pipeline` broken because of `Signature not valid in the specified time frame:` #77278
  • MonoVM + DynamicMethod semantic compatibility break between net7 & net8 #77273
  • Fix CacheEntryExtensions.SetValue()'s signature to allow null values #77264
    8.0.0
  • Consider consolidating logic of JSON Snake/Kebab naming with Camel #77262
  • [Question] [Android] Crash due to crypto asserts #77258
  • ObjWriter duplicates sections in COFF output #77257
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort make methods virtual to allow overrides #77255
  • Control how LogValuesFormatter formats structured data, or: opt-out of enumerating structured data #77253
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\22728\\debug15\\debug15.cmd #77251
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_49982\\test49982\\test49982.cmd #77250
  • dotnet watch blocks files #77249
  • System.Drawing enumerations cause CA1416 errors when a project compiled against .NET 7 RC2 #77248
  • ConfigurationBinder fails to bind class that implements IDictionary #77246
    8.0.0
  • [WASM] "Uncaught ExitStatus ExitStatus" is encountered when a default method is defined inside the interface - NOT when it is defined inside a derived class. #77244
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Transactions.Tests.OleTxTests.ImplicitDistributedTransactions_cannot_be_changed_after_being_read_as_true #77241
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread/GetAllocatedBytesForCurrentThread.sh #77240

Closed

  • System.Speech NuGet package for .NET Standard target? #77292
  • Does corerun or coreclr work normally when it loads only dll file if there are .ni.dll and .dll? #8866
    Future
  • Handle CopyFileW errors in crossgen WritePDBData() #8298
    Future
  • [Crossgen] Support multithreaded crossgen compilation #9233
    Future
  • BinSkim BA2021 on System.Private.CoreLib.dll #9321
    Future
  • Directly loading .ni.dll works differently from each `FNV/R2R` #8867
    Future
  • How to check a dll's ni file(with FragileNonVersionable option) is loaded? #8865
    Future
  • [Memory consumption] Remove relocations for Readonly section #8379
    Future
  • [Memory consumption] Remove relocations for TypeHandle fields #8248
    Future
  • Should `CacheExtensions.GetOrCreate()`/`GetOrCreateAsync()` return `TItem` instead of `TItem?`? #77266
    Future
  • `Monitor.TryEnter` sometimes fails even if `Monitor.IsEntered` returns `true` #76660
    8.0.0
  • Builds failing with error: use of undeclared identifier 'swprintf_s' #77282
    8.0.0
  • Optimize EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid #77190
    8.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Generic ObjectFactory and ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #34471
    8.0.0
  • Published Browser-Wasm with optimization and trimming enabled works on chrome but not safari #77271
    8.0.0
  • Invalid UnixFileMode value when using the TarFile API #77096
  • System.MulticastDelegate constructors should be [DebuggerStepThrough] #77131
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Globalization.Tests.StringSearch #77281

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Don't trigger static ctor with [JSExport] init #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [Android][tests] Replace hardcoded /tmp path #77291
    area-System.IO
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Decrease backlog cleanup inactivity threshold #77288
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • [tests][Android] ReAdd Android library test jobs #77280
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Simplify DynamicMethod arg validation #77277
    area-System.Reflection
  • [mono][jit] Disable inlining for constrained calls on gshared paramet… #77274
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove _fdopen from PAL #77272
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Fixed FSharp crash issue #77270
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #77269
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.1
  • Add support for delegate GDV in R2R and NAOT #77267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost docs #77265
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Template nits 2 #77263
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #77260
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.12
  • [wasm] optimize interop startup #77256
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fixed cross-build for clang-9 #77245
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move usages of `COMPlus_` var to `DOTNET_` fallback #77239
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix doc link #77297
    area-Meta
  • Fix recurisve `Monitor.TryEnter` to not return false due to a race condition #77243
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • Fix the __int64 to be long long on macOS only #77268
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove uses of PAL's `swprintf_s` from mono. #77284
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't invoke EnsureInstructionSetFlagsAreValid all the time in JIT #77237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix dotnet-pgo #77259
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adds `ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory<T>` API #77185
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Modify ARM64 thunktemplates.S to make it work with GNU ld #77275
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76955
  • Fix a signed/unsigned comparison warning #77230
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add [DebuggerStepThrough] to MulticastDelegate constructors. #77132
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trim file type bits from mode header #77151
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove more swprintf_s uses #77228
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update System.Speech to Eric/Jeff #77142
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Make sure all heap segment fields are populated in the DAC #77035
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Update .vsconfig file #77189
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] IDBFS test #77247
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Template nits 2 #77205
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support delegate GDV guards in loop cloning #75140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Don't use mov.vt when storing into primitive type fields #77221
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove non-deterministic signals from debugger tests. #77038
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] few JS interop tests #77218
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] X64 - Three instruction replacement sequence for multiply in certain cases #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Clearing all cards for free regions #77224
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Filter out addresses that are not in bookkeeping range during background promote #77067
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [mono] Vector128 ConvertTo API's for Amd64 #77211
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include dependently promoted fields in SSA #77238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Support hot cold splitting in crossgen2 #74963
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [release/7.0] [mono][interp] Fix an issue with deopt and interpreter tiering. #77059
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 7.0.x
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm] benchmark simple app without JSExport #76632
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • SmtpClientTest Assertion Fail Fix #76361
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 8.0.0
  • Fix for GitHub issue 76673 and regression test - incorrect static virtual method resolution #76724
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Android] PoC: Use Java TrustManager to call RemoteCertificateValidationCallback in SslStream #77220
    NO-REVIEW, os-android
  • Simplify AppHost/ElfUtils #77208
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up inliner substitution #77176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add initial support for Freebsd.arm64 #71486
    arch-arm64, os-freebsd, area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold primitive-typed access to promoted structs in local morph and forbid mismatched struct assignments #76766
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Green Threads] Various helper calls do not transition to the OS thread #2051
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, WASM] double/float 64, RuntimeError: table index is out of bounds #2049

Closed

  • [Green Threads] FCalls do not swap to the OS stack #2017
  • [NativeAOT]How to fix System.NotSupportedException: Metadata for type 'Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject' was not provided by TypeInfoResolver of type '.aot.MyJsonContext' #2046

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Conflict review test #2050

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to build more than one platform target? #28697
  • dotnet tool package cache bug #28695
  • Write installed workload version to workload stamp file. #28682
  • Custom ITask with Output of Reference is not showed in the Projects Dependencies #28694
  • Update roslyn-analyzers version and remove false-positive suppressions #28672
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • `dotnet workload` fails with KeyNotFoundException after updating SDKs #28217
    7.0.1xx
  • restore-toolset.* still referencing 6.0 RC2 #23383

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2026150 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Create workloads enumerator lazily in dotnet-new host #28677
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28666
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Implicit RID Opt Out + Don't Infer RID for non EXE Type Projects #28628
    Bug, Servicing-consider

Updated

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • RuntimeIdentifiers Code Coverage + Implicit RuntimeIdentifiers (not just runtimeIdentifier) #28484
    Area-ILLink
  • Disable the windows SDK automated references for c++ #28596
    Area-NetSDK
  • Use latest docker containers #28422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28667
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28668
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • style rule to remove accessibility modifier shows up as "Add accessibility modifier" in lightbulbs (IDE0040 Accessibility modifiers required) #64877
  • Notify InfraSwat and ICs ASAP when validation insertions are failing RPS #64872
  • Missing CS0238 error for private static interface members #64871
  • Diagnostic text for CS4016 is inaccurate for `ValueTask<T>` methods #64863
  • Autocompletion for `return new …` statement differs between `Task` and `ValueTask` methods #64862
  • [Regression] Pressing TAB twice during event handler creation no longer navigates to event handler method #64857
    17.5
  • Feature request: Renaming a parameter also changes part of a string #64851

Closed

  • CoreCompile is missing Analyzer references in it's stated inputs #64103
  • Generic type parameter csproj reference requirements changed (CS0012) #64864
  • Analyzer consistency check should not consider MVID on .NET Core #64826
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Account for delegate creation inside an explicitly-converted tuple expression #64882
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Remove project-cache-service #64880
    Area-IDE
  • Foreach ref assignment without identity conversion should give error #64879
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64878
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64876
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64874
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Only call into OOP for C#/VB projects when doing designer scanning #64870
    Area-IDE
  • Make abstract method virtual to prevent binary break #64869
    Area-IDE
  • Log telemetry about what sort of sqlexceptions we're getting and how often we're disabling storage #64865
    Area-IDE
  • Allow and emit `params` arrays in lambdas #64861
    Area-Compilers
  • Only write out inVs properties when appropriate #64853
    Area-IDE
  • Verify the error type and span only for error tag #64852
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add additional check to try to find later crash #64850
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Revert #64616 and #64576 #64873
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64875
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Implement equality semantics for async tagger tags." #64867
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Configure test import ordering based on runtime globalization implementation #64849
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64856
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix missing Analyzer property ref in build #64129
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Disable sqlite service on full disk #64844
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix analyzer consistency checks #64831
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update NuGet version to run MSBuildWorkspace tests against .NET SDK #64840
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Disable Windows PDB conversion #64581
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64860
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64859
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64855
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64854
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #64845
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64846
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use ParsedDocument in more commmand handlers #63579
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Allow ref initializers for ref fields #64817
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Update the global.json pinned SDK to .NET 7 RC2 #64883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace #64644
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for recoverable syntax trees #64739
    Area-IDE
  • Add IOperation test where IObjectCreationOperation.Constructor is null #63092
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for implementation edges in our LSIF indexer #64263
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • add telemetry log overload #64803
    Area-IDE
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support caller info and nullability attributes in lambdas #64823
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove net50 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compression error in br encoding depending on razor cshtml format #44667
  • amr claim lost after ClaimPrincipal renewal #44666
  • Enable CodeQL3000 pipelines across our repos #44662
  • Identity login uses PasswordSignInAsync the wrong way #44660
  • .NET6 Blazor Server - using 'ProcessStartInfo.UseShellExecute = false' forces UI Component to Reinitialize? #44658

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core 7.0's default authentication handler fallback breaks OpenIddict #44661
  • Blazor WebAssembly client app - enable CORS #44625
  • Blazor Delay in AccessToken being ready and authorized view showing #21448
    Backlog
  • Break on first-chance exception in Web Assembly debugger #42510
    Backlog
  • Hash in service-worker-assets.js is stale after build #41396
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Validation Summary Tag Helper renders style attribute which conflicts with Content Security Policy (CSP) #43714
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Core 5 Standalone Blazor Webassembly Remote Register does not work #29246
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.ListenOptionsHttpsExtensions without reflection ? #31561
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Update CSharp.Common.targets #44665
    area-infrastructure
  • Add more StringSyntaxAttrbute syntaxes #44663
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support side-by-side transports in Kestrel #44657
    area-runtime
  • Route tooling: Support component routes #44656
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor

Merged

  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • [8.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44643 #44654
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2026062 #44664
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Add Json StringSyntaxAttribute syntaxes #44641
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • #42806 removing +1 from previous reconnection attempts #44611
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.1
  • StringUtilities with xplat-intrinsics (and a little perf-tuning) #44040
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security, blog-candidate
  • [6.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44645
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [7.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44644
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Remove some `GCHandle`s from `SendHeaders()` #44561
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #44601
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet-counters issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command-line #3366
    7.0.0

Updated

  • Support collecting startup traces with dotnet trace #3467

PullRequests

Created

  • Proposed spec for GetProcessInfo3 IPC command #3476

Updated

  • dotnet-monitor: Port stop-on-event infrastructure #3472
  • Enhance client-client dotnet-dsrouter mode. #3455
  • Port GCDump fixes from PerfView #3475
    dotnet-gcdump
  • Add websocket modes to dotnet-dsrouter #3461

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Move the splash image generation out of the main image generation task #10811
  • Frame behaves differently compared to Xamarin.Forms #10807
    Backlog
  • Bindings are executed twice #10806
    Backlog
  • Date Format property in DatePicker not working on Windows with date Format #10805
    Backlog
  • .net 7 android compiler error (Java) #10802
  • Maui causes memory leak on iOS #10801
    Backlog
  • WinUI Dynamic height in grid does not work when nothing else changes #10799
    Backlog
  • Touch effects in MAUI toolbar item is not similar to Xamarin forms toolbar item #10798
    Backlog

Closed

  • WebAuthenticator Broken on iOS15 #10534
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ScrollView inside StackLayout is not scrolling #10786
  • [Bug] Scroll view inside the stack layout not scrolling. #10787
  • Window.Height is -1 in Page_loaded() in Android Maui. #10747
    Backlog
  • MenuFlyoutItem command binding not working in submenu items #10734
    Backlog
  • Grid default child layout changed #10797
  • Cannot create native types when deployment is executed to iPhone from VS for Windows without pairing to MAC #10800
  • .NET MAUI Icon and Splash screen Looks Bad #10669
  • WebView not displaying Leaflet map on Android #8276
    Backlog
  • Preference not work with DateTime #8853
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid app crashing on physical iOS device, but nowhere else #9533
  • UI not adapting size on macOS (when resizing) and iPad (when rotated) #10631
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not take into account device orientation #10593

PullRequests

Created

  • Add check to ensure measurement for AndExpandLayoutManager #10813
    area/layout 🔲
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • Fix net7 branch with Analyzers fixes #10808
  • [iOS] Fix issue loading local files in WebView #10804
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • iOS15 WindowStateManager Window Support #10550
    area/lifecycle 🔁, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

  • Update TODO comments for API changes that did not make it for .NET 7 #10794

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22514.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22518.1 #10783
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Fix more comment/docs typos #10796
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Updated

  • Move init to mapper and move test components to reusable test runner library #10751
  • Update Package.appxmanifest to have PhonePublisherId #9477
    partner/winui, do-not-merge, community ✨
  • Fix more inline API docs #10785
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758

  • [Windows] Fix crash with second window and WebView #10013
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, high, control-webview
  • Allow to reset an Image setting the Source to null #10371
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Load local images without extensions on Windows #9631

  • [Windows] Rename W2DImage to PlatformImage #9948

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF should warn or prevent users from seeding large amounts of model data #29395 #29403

Closed

  • EF should warn or prevent users from seeding large amounts of model data #29395
  • Add interception for connection creation #16714
    Backlog
  • EF.Default doesn't work for value types #28921
    Backlog
  • Improve binding of RelationalTypeMapping objects to model #8625
    6.0.0
  • EF core change the datetime property of a object when saving #29399
  • Migrations messing up my schema. #29389
  • Cannot run `dotnet ef migrations script --no-build` simultaneously. #29352
  • Can't translated `set.GroupBy(x=>x.Time.Year)` #29345
  • Optimistic concurrency check should be configurable #6218
  • Is the usage of enums as discriminators supported in TPH? #29373
  • End-to-end soft delete #19695
  • Disable lazy loading proxies on demand #27570
  • How to configure temporal table with multiple owned entities in EF7? #29400

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #29365 - Query/Test: convert FromSql tests to use query infra #29402
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove SQL Server-specific test config from relational #29401
    auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer text is cropped #14522

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a pipeline for automated VMR synchronization #14805
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #14803
  • #14522 adjusting width to avoid cropping. #14798

Merged

  • Set `product-construction` as code owners for `src/VirtualMonoRepo` #14802
  • Update DarcLib, change VMR source mappings back to `.json` #14788
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update source-build tarball CI to utilize faster build agents #14795

Updated

  • Add a prototype telemetry setting test. #14693
  • [WIP] Get source-build main building #14790
  • [main] Add support for arm platform #14470
